channel.title: Npc talking
channel.description: Hello i have been trying to change an npc hans (npcid 0) to say "Welcome to Phantomscape" so when i edit it in both my client.java and my npc handler and compile, then i go on server and he still says nothing. Also ive tried to change him to Death(npcid 2862) but still it doesnt work.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 13, 2008, 05:42:31 AM[/size][hr]Also how do i change an npc's coords?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 13, 2008, 09:39:47 AM[/size][hr]Wow i love the help im getting on a forum made specifically for helping people with RSPS' great help....

item.title: Npc talking
item.dc:creator: @Monoxide Monoxide
item.description:
@Monoxide wrote:

Hello i have been trying to change an npc hans (npcid 0) to say “Welcome to Phantomscape” so when i edit it in both my client.java and my npc handler and compile, then i go on server and he still says nothing. Also ive tried to change him to Death(npcid 2862) but still it doesnt work.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 13, 2008, 05:42:31 AM[/size][hr]Also how do i change an npc’s coords?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 13, 2008, 09:39:47 AM[/size][hr]Wow i love the help im getting on a forum made specifically for helping people with RSPS’ great help…
